name: Fast Tag Credit
author: FastFlow

sections.description:
Fast Tag Credit is designed to work seamlessly with the Fast Flow tagging system and Fast WooCredit

Using Fast WooCredit you can create a WooCommerce based credit store.

Fast Tag Credit extends this further by allowing you to automate the addition or removal of credit based on a users tags.

This can be useful for subscriptions and refunds of orders with deeper integration of your CRM through Fast Tags and one of our other Fast Flow addons.

NOTE: Fast Tag Credit requires the Fast Flow Dashboard to make use of the Fast Tags and utilise the user tagging.

https://wordpress.org/plugins/fast-flow-dashboard/

You can find out more about Fast Flow here

https://fastflow.io
sections.installation:
NOTE: This plugin requires the Fast Flow Dashboard to make use of Fast Tags.

Upload through your WordPress admin or via FTP.

Once uploaded simply activate and then navigate to the Fast Tags section of the Fast Flow Dashboard and begin adding tags.
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

  • Update to reset credit balance to 0 when 0 amount is entered

1.1.0

  • Prepared for repository release
